meanings.definition: The quality or state of being lumpish.
meanings.sent1: Her lumpishnesses made it hard for her to keep up with the others in the race.
meanings.sent2: His lumpishnesses were evident in the way he moved slowly and clumsily.
meanings.sent3: Despite his lumpishnesses, he managed to finish the puzzle before anyone else.
meanings.sent4: The lumpishnesses of the old car made it difficult to navigate through the narrow streets.
meanings.sent5: The lumpishnesses of the bear made it seem even more intimidating.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being dull or sluggish in movement or thought.
meanings.sent1: The lumpishnesses of the sloth were evident as it moved slowly through the trees.
meanings.sent2: Her lumpishnesses in class were a result of staying up late studying the night before.
meanings.sent3: The lumpishnesses of the turtle racing against the hare was a comical sight.
meanings.sent4: His mind was clouded with lumpishnesses, making it hard to focus on the task at hand.
meanings.sent5: The lumpishnesses of the clouds moving slowly across the sky matched his sluggish mood.
